viewData.name: Microneedling Jive After Care 50ml 6pcs
viewData.short_description: Skin calming cream intended for advanced skincare after microneedling treatment. Carefully selected ingredients fight up the skin-irritants you're exposed to daily, resulting with more clear and healthier skin. Contains rich complex of amino acids and glucoside know for its ability to stimulate the production of both collagen and elastin, at the same time working together to stave off breakouts, soothe irritations and balance pores.
viewData.long_description: Powerful antioxidants, help repair and protect the skin barrier from damage, calming current skin inflammations, balancing pores, plumping fine lines, and fading dark spots and acne scars. Intended for younger skin, as well as oily and problematic skin , fighting skin imperfections and first signs of aging.
